episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4001_1001_:
We will now commence exhibition matches
celebrating the arrival of Leon, Champion of the
Galar region!
This event will feature three exhibition matches!
The first match: Gloria and Alder!
The second match: Marnie and Karen!

And to top it all off, we’ll have a showdown
between Blue and Leon!

These elite Galar Trainers are the best of
of the best. Feast your eyes on these matches!

Leon’s going up against Blue?! Now that’s a match
I can’t wait to see!

I can’t believe I’ll be able to see Leon, the
unbeatable Champion, battle here on Pasio!

Wow. Feel that energy? It reminds me of the
stadiums back home in Galar!

Yeah! Let’s give this pumped-up crowd some
matches to remember!
Yeah. We can’t let them down.
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4001_0401_: OK! Let’s show them some unforgettable battles!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4001_0302_:
I can’t wait to see the match
between Champions!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4001_0402_:
I promise, these matches are really gonna get the
crowd going!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4001_1001_:
She’s a member of the Johto Elite Four...an’ she
uses Dark-type Pokémon, just like you.

She’s strong—that goes without saying. But there’s
a lot you could learn from her, too.

Karen, of the Johto Elite Four...
I’m not gonna lose to her!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4002_1001_:
I’m so excited to battle the former Champion
of Unova!

Yes, I see how strong you stand. And looking at
your partner Pokémon...

You’re the best opponent we could ask for! Here
we go!

You’re really strong, Alder! But we’re not
done yet!

Am I being overpowered?!
This is nothing! I will overpower you!
Volcarona, it all comes down to this!
Zacian! Let’s show them our true power! Go!
Well done! You certainly are an unmatched talent!
Alder, you were so strong! I thought I might lose!
Not at all! You may have bested us this time...

but don’t think I’ll let that happen again! I look
forward to our next match!
Gloria won... So I can’t lose now!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4003_1001_:
Hmmm? So you’re a Dark-type Pokémon user, too,
are you?

I also see you’ve partnered up with your favorites.
I like that in a Trainer.
I won’t lose, no matter who my opponent is!

Leon’s not the only name that’ll be remembered
on Pasio. We’ll have everyone cheering just as
loud for Spikemuth an’ Marnie!

Is that so? I wish you the best. Just try to
entertain me!
Let’s go!
Morpeko! We’re in to win this!
I’ve more or less figured you out.

Morpeko, hang in there! Time to use that special
attack we’ve been savin’!
Morpeko?!

No... At this rate, we’re gonna lose...
even though Gloria won her battle.
Marnie! Believe in yourself and your partner!
You can do it, Marnie!
Listen, Marnie!

You’ve trained hard in Spikemuth and battled toe-
to-toe with your rival during the Gym Challenge!
I know what you’re made of! You can do more!
The Gym Challenge... My rival...

(That’s right. I challenged Gloria so many
times. Ever since the first time we battled, I still
haven’t beaten her yet, though I’ve got close.)

(But each battle taught me something new, and
that’s how we made each other stronger!)
You can do it, Marnie! Hurray! Hurray! Marnie!
Heh heh. That’s kind of embarrassing.
Right! We’ve got this! We’re stronger now!

Nothing left to do but to put everything I’ve got
out there!
Morpeko! Time for our sync move!

Oh? So you do still have some fight in you. Let’s
keep this going, then!
I’ll do better than anything you throw at me!
We lost...

You’ve got a lot of spunk—I like to see that in
a Trainer.
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4004_1001_:
What’re you talking about? You just showed us
one heck of a battle.

Yeah! Your battle was amazing! You’ve got so
much stronger, Marnie!

You really pumped up the crowd, too! What a
great match!

Thanks. To tell you the truth, I also had a lot of
fun during that match.
And now I know what I need to work on!

Since I’m aiming to be a Champion, I’m gonna get
even stronger!
Great! I love that determined look on your face!

I’m looking forward to seeing you grow as
a Trainer!

And I guess that means it’s my turn now! I’m
gonna rock this crowd!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4005_1001_: I guess these Galar Trainers aren’t too shabby!

After seeing battles like that, I’m starting to think
this might end up being pretty fun after all!

I can’t lose, either! As the Champion of Galar,
I have the duty of getting the crowd fired up!

It’s the start of an epic battle! Let’s enjoy our
champion time!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4006_1001_: Go, Blastoise! Show ’em what we’ve got!

Looks like you won’t be making this easy for me...
But we’re still just getting warmed up!
With our sync move, we’re sure to be the victors!

Charizard! Let’s show them the true strength of
our bond!

That was an excellent match! Everyone’s going
wild over it!
Man, I can’t believe I lost! But at least it was fun!

I’m always battling Red, so I thought I knew
everything there is to know about battling
a Charizard.

But it makes sense that even with the same
Pokémon, different Trainers would come at you
with different tactics.
I wanna battle you again... And not just once!
Red... So you two are friends!

I keep upping my game and getting stronger
because I wanna beat Red! It’s only a matter of
time until I take him down.

Rivals, huh? That’s true—Trainers don’t just get
stronger on their own.

You and I have both got rivals who make
us stronger!

Oh, really? That rival of yours must be pretty
good, given how strong you are!
Yeah, he’s a Gym Leader in Galar...

It’s all thanks to him that I became known as
the unbeatable Leon!
episode_event_ch0247_00_dande/4007_1001_:
Well done! I expected no less from the best
of Galar!
I wanna do the Chawrizard pose!

That match between the Champions was
amazing... I’ve gotta work even harder!

I’m aiming for the top here on Pasio, too! And I’m
gonna let everyone know just how cool
Spikemuth is!
Miss? You were really cool out there!
One day, I’m gonna be a Trainer just like you!

Hear the passion in the voices of all the people
cheering for you? You can feel good about how
you did today!
Yeah! Thanks. Champions really are the coolest.

Thank you! You know, my dream is to get stronger
together with everybody!
So let’s keep on raising the bar!
